name: Tampa Police Department
foia_template:
Dear Records Custodian,

Pursuant to Chapter 119, Florida Statutes (Florida Public Records Act), I am requesting copies of the following records from {agency_name}:

1. All body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to {incident_description}
2. All dashboard camera footage related to the same incident
3. All Computer-Aided Dispatch (CAD) records and call logs
4. All incident reports, supplemental reports, and use-of-force reports
5. Any internal affairs complaints or investigations related to this incident

Incident Date: {incident_date}
Incident Location: {incident_location}

I am willing to pay reasonable duplication costs as provided by law. Please notify me in advance if costs will exceed $25.00.

Please provide responsive records in electronic format where available. Per Section 119.07(1)(a), F.S., the custodian shall provide copies in the medium requested if the agency maintains the records in that medium.

If any records are withheld, please cite the specific statutory exemption and provide a redacted version where possible.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this request.

Sincerely,
FOIA Archive Records Request System
recordsrequest@foiaarchive.com

name: Florida Highway Patrol - Troop C
foia_template:
Dear Public Records Coordinator,

Pursuant to Chapter 119, Florida Statutes (Florida Public Records Act), I am submitting this request to the {agency_name} for copies of the following records:

1. All dashboard camera and in-car video footage related to {incident_description}
2. All body-worn camera (BWC) footage, if applicable
3. All Computer-Aided Dispatch (CAD) records and radio communications
4. All crash reports, incident reports, and supplemental reports
5. All use-of-force reports related to this incident

Incident Location: {incident_location}

I am willing to pay reasonable duplication costs as provided by law. Please notify me in advance if costs will exceed $25.00.

name: Florida Department of Law Enforcement
foia_template:
Dear Public Records Coordinator,

Pursuant to Chapter 119, Florida Statutes (Florida Public Records Act), I am submitting this request to the {agency_name} for copies of the following records:

1. All body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to {incident_description}
2. All surveillance or recording device footage related to the same incident
3. All Computer-Aided Dispatch (CAD) records and radio communications
4. All investigative reports, incident reports, and supplemental reports
5. All use-of-force reports related to this incident
6. Any officer-involved shooting investigation materials, if applicable

Incident Date: {incident_date}
Incident Location: {incident_location}

I am willing to pay reasonable duplication costs as provided by law. Please notify me in advance if costs will exceed $25.00.

Please provide responsive records in electronic format where available. Per Section 119.07(1)(a), F.S., the custodian shall provide copies in the medium requested if the agency maintains the records in that medium.

I understand that certain active investigation records may be temporarily exempt under Section 119.071(2)(c), F.S. If any records are exempt or confidential, please cite the specific statutory exemption and provide a redacted version where possible.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this request.

Sincerely,
FOIA Archive Records Request System
recordsrequest@foiaarchive.com
